name: Arpeggio Occaecat eu non velit
desc: Sint dolor fugiat culpa culpa magna.

steps.name: Tilt without vibrato
steps.desc: Complete (see video and instruction sheet) WITHOUT VIBRATO

steps.name: 5-Note Scale in 6ths (B flat)
steps.desc: 5-Note Scale in 6ths (B flat, from D/Bb up to  A/F and back down) with joining vibrato. Do not pause on top note
